wikitext.*: <noinclude>纯粹的css</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgCommonTalkBox) || !$wgCommonTalkBox}--><!--{assign var="wgCommonTalkBox" value=true scope="global"}--><style>#commonTalkBox{margin: 0 auto;background-color: #FFFFFF; font-size:95%;}#commonTalkBoxCaption{border-bottom:1px solid #C0C090; background-color: #A7C1F2;display:table-caption;font-weight: bold;text-align:center;}#commonTalkBoxLeft{background-color: #eff1fe; text-align:left;display:table-cell;width:290px;vertical-align: middle;}#commonTalkBoxRight{display:table-cell;}#commonTalkBoxRight>div{border: 1px solid #C0C090;border-top-width:0; width: 122px;background-color: #eff1fe; margin-left: 20px; margin-bottom: 0px; text-align:left;vertical-align: middle;}.skin-vector #commonTalkBox{width:445px;}#centerText{margin:auto; padding: 4px 0; text-align:center;}.skin-vector #centerText{width: 30em;}</style><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
